"Seasonal Enemies":
"During this Seasonal Event, some enemies in some Sections will have a special marking on them, and their Attribute weakness will be different from usual. In addition, all Rappies will have their names and appearances changed. These are known as Seasonal Enemies.

If you defeat them, you can earn Seasonal Points, as well as limited-time items."

"During this Seasonal Event, <yellow>Seasonal Enemies<c> with special markings on them will appear in specific Sections. Defeating these enemies, as well as defeating Rappies with unusual appearances and names, will reward you with limited-time items and <yellow>Seasonal Points<c>."
